subject: Cruelty to Animals
Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: Ernie Paragallo, the thoroughbred horse breeder and owner, was convicted on 33 charges of animal cruelty Wednesday  for starving and neglecting horses on his Hudson Valley farm.
snippet: Ernie Paragallo, the thoroughbred horse breeder and owner, was convicted on 33 charges of animal cruelty Wednesday  for starving and neglecting horses on his Hudson Valley farm.
